youNeedToProvideAnEmail: You need to provide an email address for the business you are registering. Welsh
wellUseThisTo: We'll use this to send essential emails about the authorised agent. For example, if we need to: Welsh
askForMoreInformation: ask for more information about the agent’s filings Welsh
checkTheAgentIsComplying: check the agent is complying with its legal responsibilities Welsh
suspendTheAgentAccount: suspend the agent account, or take other enforcement action Welsh
updateEmailAddressAfter: You’ll be able to update the email address after you’ve registered the authorised agent. Welsh
whatEmailForCorrespondence: What email address should we use for correspondence? Welsh
error-emailFormatIncorrect: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com Welsh
